Package entities

Class Enemy

java.lang.Object
entities.Entity
entities.Enemy
Direct Known Subclasses:
Boss, FollowEnemy, PassiveEnemy, Sniper
public abstract class Enemy extends Entity
Abstract class to declare enemies
See Also:
  • Entity

  • Constructor Details

    • Enemy

      public Enemy(float x, float y)
      default enemy constructor, Initialize enemy object calls initSprite to load sprite render configuration
      Parameters:
      x - X coordinate of enemy
      y - Y coordinate of enemy

    • Enemy

      public Enemy(float x, float y, int TYPE)
      TYPE enemy constructor, Initialize enemy object, declaring the type calls the default constructor
      Parameters:
      x - X coordinate of enemy
      y - Y coordinate of enemy
      TYPE - enemy type

  • Method Details

    • update

      public void update()
      does an update cycle, moves the hitbox(and the sprite) of the enemy ¿¿maybe?? ¿¿check collision with player?? call updatePos(); to update positions
      Overrides:
      update in class Entity

    • updateAction

      protected void updateAction()

    • projCollision

      public void projCollision()
      calculates project collisions

    • render

      public void render(Graphics g, float offsetX, float offsetY)
      render the enemy on Graphics g with the offset given, if it is in the screen horizontal coordinates
      Parameters:
      g - Graphics object to draw on
      offsetX - horizontal offset of screen
      offsetY - vertical offset of screen

    • LoadAnimations

      protected void LoadAnimations(String path)
      load the animations atlas, subdivide it to single animation frames
      Parameters:
      path - local path to animations atlas

    • updatePos

      protected void updatePos()
      update enemy position moves the hitbox of the enemy, based on the movements variables checks vertical moements, then horizontal movement, if a movement is blocked, the enemy is placed right beside the wall, roof/ceiling. calls prePosUpdate(), onRoofCealingTouch(), onWallTouch() events calls updateXpos() to handle horizontal movements

    • jump

      protected void jump()
      jump command if not inAir, airSpeed is set to JumpSpeed, and inAir is set to true

    • resetMovements

      protected void resetMovements()
      reset commands reset commands variable

    • loadLvlData

      public void loadLvlData(int[][] data)
      load level data needs to be called after object reations, needed to update
      Parameters:
      data - the level data

    • loadPlayer

      public void loadPlayer(Player p)
      load player reference
      Parameters:
      p - player reference

    • teleport

      public void teleport(float x, float y)
      change enemy coordinates needs to be called after object reations, needed to update
      Parameters:
      x - new X coordinate of enemy
      y - new Y coordinate of enemy

    • updateAnimationTick

      protected void updateAnimationTick()
      increase animation tick, every aniSpeed updates, animation frame is changed

    • onWallTouch

      protected void onWallTouch()
      event when a movement touches a wall, should be overridden from a subclass to implement event

    • onRoofCealingTouch

      protected void onRoofCealingTouch()
      event when a movement touches a roof/ceiling, should be overridden from a subclass to implement event

    • prePosUpdate

      protected void prePosUpdate(Player p)
      event called every time before position update, should be overridden from a subclass to implement event
      Parameters:
      p - player reference
